__e: Felix found the drugs a few days ago.
Felix didn't have anything to do with it!
And you give Felix and me a pass.
It was our room, Felix and mine.
Has the what to do with Felix and me?
Felix, do you see any problem with a guy showing pride in his work?
The Felix is ​​not easy I like him..
I can't believe this-- Felix is gone, too?
What do you want to drink, Felix?
Felix, I know you're in there! Open the door, now!
I can't go home, Felix. I...
Felix, you want to be a famous doctor, don't you?
Felix, you forgot it was my turn!
Felix, you know you can trust me, right?
Why don't we go inside Mr. Felix we have something else to arrange, for which you'll thank me.
- You tell Felix you were meeting us?
Everyone will forget who they are, time will stand still, and, Felix... we will be in charge.
